name: more_from_author
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool worldwide_recipes.
Tool description: Over 2 MILLION recipes, nutrition, ingredients, users and reviews worldwide.
API description: Fetches more recipes from a specified author using the Worldwide Recipes API.

profile_display_name.description: The display name of the author's profile to retrieve recipes from.

canonical_term.description: The search term or keyword related to the author's recipes.
